feed.title: Category: Chet Kanojia | Furth burners and related widgets.

entry.title: More power to Chet Kanojia and Aereo
entry.content:
I met this Chet Kanojia a few years ago at a technology meet in Boston. He was already a bit of a celebrity then, in a room full of TV execs and advertisement execs. Chet has the raw energy of a man on a mission. I wish Aereo and Chet speedy and awesome success in their endeavors. Life’s too short for annoying monopolies and cartels.

Check out more about Chet at nytimes.com.
